content: a hat pattern for self striping yarn that jogs things up a bit there is also a matching scarf the pattern worked at gauge and with 1 skein of noro kureyon produces a hat that will be about 22 without too much stretch if you want a bigger hat either use a bigger hook or work an extra increase round or 2 at the top before starting the v stitches you ll need an extra skein for a bigger size please do not sell the pattern or items made from it thank you
